questions.question: Which of the following casting process doesn’t require riser:

explanations.a: Molten metal does not solidify in the same way as in traditional sand casting processes.
explanations.b: Lost foam casting typically does not require risers because the molten metal does not solidify in the same way as in traditional sand casting processes. In lost foam casting, the pattern (made of polystyrene) is vaporized when the molten metal is poured, creating a void that is filled by the metal without the need for risers to feed additional molten metal to the casting.
